entities.name: professor trelawney
entities.description: Professor Trelawney is introduced as a familiar and misty voice, making her usual dramatic entrance out of the shadows. She is described as sitting with her back to the fire and gazing around.

entities.name: parvati
entities.description: Parvati is mentioned along with Lavender, quivering with excitement, their faces lit by the milky glow of their crystal ball.
